channel.title: Save On Bvlgari 4045B | BV 4045B
channel.description: A jeweller from Greece by the name of Sotirios Voulgaris was the founder of Bvlgari.His name in Italian becomes Soritio Bulgari when translated. Bulgari started his first jewellery store in his hometown. In 1877 he left for Italy, travelling via Corfu and then to Naples. Seven years after first setting off, he settled in Rome. [...]

Bulgari started his first jewellery store in his hometown. In 1877 he left for Italy, travelling via Corfu and then to Naples. Seven years after first setting off, he settled in Rome. [...]
